description.first: Let's contact, together we can create great things. I am a developer with
description.second: years of experience in the world of Web.

about.first: I began my journey in the field of computer science in 2014, exploring various areas before specializing in web development (specifically in the frontend profile) and artificial intelligence (with a focus on machine learning). I have always enjoyed facing professional challenges and seeking innovative solutions, and I take pride in my high level of commitment to the tasks assigned to me.
about.second: I graduated in Computer Engineering in 2020 from the University of Matanzas Camilo Cienfuegos. During my studies, I achieved excellent academic results that allowed me to participate in numerous projects and professional practices. A milestone in my academic career was the publication of my thesis to opt for the title of Computer Engineer in a prestigious scientific journal for its impact in the applied area, which reflects my commitment to research and innovation. My outstanding performance earned me the honor of being selected as the best student in my career, and I was invited to join the Union of Computer Scientists of Cuba (UIC by its acronym in Spanish).
about.third: My native language is Spanish, and I also have a basic level of English. My dedication and responsibility towards my work, combined with my passion for computer science, have allowed me to achieve successful results in my projects. I am always willing to learn and acquire new skills to continue growing in my career.
about.fourth: I hope to have the opportunity to bring my experience and skills to a new challenge in the field of computer science.

contact.subject: Subject
contact.subjectPlaceholder: Let me know how I can help you

first.name: Professor at the University of Matanzas.
first.description: I taught Web Programming and Artificial Intelligence, two fascinating and constantly evolving fields. During this time, I not only taught, but also learned a lot from my students, which allowed me to grow both personally and professionally. In addition to my teaching duties, I was actively involved in the development of several innovative projects in these areas. This experience allowed me to apply and expand my theoretical knowledge, while giving me the opportunity to contribute to the advancement of these disciplines. My participation in these projects has been an integral part of my career and has reinforced my passion for teaching and development.

second.name: Designer and developer of the AMB Septic Tank website.
second.description: I had the opportunity to design and develop the website for a thriving septic business located in Miami, Florida. Despite being a static and simple website, its intuitive and easy-to-navigate design proved to be a valuable asset for the business. This project not only improved the online visibility of the business, but also boosted its reach to a wider audience. The implementation of this website marked a milestone in the business's trajectory, providing it with a significant boost. My contribution to the success of this business through web design and development has been a rewarding and enriching experience.

third.name: Developer at Green Island Solution
third.description: I currently work as a frontend developer at a prestigious company that provides services to PartsBase Inc., a renowned corporation based in North America. My main role is to create and optimize attractive and functional user interfaces. Working closely with PartsBase Inc., we strive to continuously improve the user experience, which in turn helps us maintain our position as a leader in our field.

third.title: AleDev's Portfolio - Summary and sample of my work üßë‚Äçüíª
third.description: This is my personal portfolio, a detailed representation of my trajectory in the world of programming. It not only highlights my work experience, but also exhibits a variety of projects that I have carried out, serving as examples of my ability and versatility. In addition, the application provides an option for visitors to contact me directly, facilitating interaction and communication.

fourth.title: TesApp - Test y evaluaciones üóíÔ∏è
fourth.description: With TesApp, you can take tests on a variety of topics and receive an instant evaluation of your performance. At the end of the test, the app provides you with a score based on a 10-point system and shows you the correct answers so you can learn from your mistakes. Get ready to learn in a fun and effective way with TesApp!
